Wesley Fofana has ended speculation over his immediate future by signing a new long-term contract at Leicester City.

articles.title: ‘We fight, therefore we exist’: what lay behind Mexico’s brutal football riot? - The Guardian
articles.description: Three people were left critically injured after violence at Querétaro v Atlas. But many observers said the scenes could have been prevented
